meanings.definition: A type of furniture that can be folded for easy storage.
meanings.sent1: I bought some foldaways for my small apartment to save space.
meanings.sent2: The foldaways in the living room are perfect for guests to sleep on.
meanings.sent3: My cat thinks the foldaways are secret tunnels to explore.
meanings.sent4: The foldaways transformed the room into a cozy reading nook.
meanings.sent5: The bright colors of the foldaways make them stand out in the room.

meanings.definition: The act of folding something away for storage.
meanings.sent1: After using the table, I did the foldaways to clear up space.
meanings.sent2: She did the foldaways with the chairs after the party was over.
meanings.sent3: His attempt at foldaways with the map ended up in a mess on the floor.
meanings.sent4: The foldaways of the clothes in the drawer made everything neat and tidy.
meanings.sent5: The foldaways of the papers on the desk revealed a hidden note underneath.
